  • Value Set US Core Procedure ICD-10pcs

    • This is the Version 2.0.0 Release of the USCoreR4 Implementation Guide, based on FHIR Version 3.6.0. See the Directory of published versions

    • Narrative Content
    • XML
    • JSON
    Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core-r4/ValueSet/us-core-procedure-icd10pcs
    Version:2.0.0
    Name:US_Core_ICD_10_PCS_Procedure_Codes
    Definition:

    This value set defines a set of codes from ICD10-PCS that can be used to indicate a type of procedure performed

    Publisher:HL7 US Realm Steering Committee
    Copyright:The International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Procedure Coding System (ICD-10-PCS) was developed for the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). CMS is the U.S. governmental agency responsible for overseeing all changes and modifications to the ICD-10-PCS.
    Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle

    This value set is not used

    US Core ICD-10-PCS Procedure Codes

    This value set defines a set of codes from ICD10-PCS that can be used to indicate a type of procedure performed

    Copyright Statement: The International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Procedure Coding System (ICD-10-PCS) was developed for the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). CMS is the U.S. governmental agency responsible for overseeing all changes and modifications to the ICD-10-PCS.

    This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

    • Include all codes defined in http://www.icd10data.com/icd10pcs

    Expansion

    No Expansion for this valueset (not supported by Publication Tooling)
